alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 10:43AM CST until February 10 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Mississippi... Chickasawhay At Leakesville affecting Greene, Wayne and George Counties. For the Chickasawhay River...including Leakesville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Chickasawhay At Leakesville. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22 feet, Flooding of lowlands continues and some roads in low lying areas become cut off by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Sunday the stage was 23.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 20 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
